name: Crop Eco Shirt/ Dusky Rose Crop Top/ Half Shirt Large XL
description:
Incredibly Soft Drapey Stretch Knit Crop Top with Vintage Flower Applique.

Dusky rose stretch knit crop tee with asymmetrical hem. A lovely rose applique adorns the front of this romantic top.

I make these shirts with my own designs using quality salvaged and upcycled materials.

Size: L/XL or Oversized on smaller folk.

Measurements taken laying flat and doubled:

Chest: 38" with lots of stretch
Length:12" at shortest 19" at longest point of asymmetrical hem

Please contact me if you have any questions about a shop item or international shipping costs.

Thanks for looking! <3

name: Eco Crop Top/ Color Block Jersey Half Shirt/ Stretch Knit Crop Top Aqua Pink Flowers
description:
Soft Cotton Stretch Knit Off-the-Shoulder Jersey Style Crop Shirt

I make these raglan sleeve off-the-shoulder shirts using my own pattern. Designed and sewn entirely by me using quality, salvaged vintage stretch knits. Embellished with vintage lace.

Size: M/L

Also, I have quite a bit of knit fabric at this moment. so, if you like the style of shirt, but not the colors, let me know and maybe we can work something out.

Thanks for looking! <3

Please contact me with any questions about a shop item or international shipping costs.

name: Color Block Stripe Batwing Blouse/ Funky Half Shirt/ Vintage Crop Top Red Pastel Stripes S/M
description:
Soft Diagonal Striped Stretch Knit Batwing Shirt

Soft vintage stretch knit with sweet diagonal stripes in pastel shades of blue, pink, orange on a red background. Made using my own pattern. Designed and sewn entirely by me using quality salvaged and thrifted materials.

Looks super cute worn with shorts, jeans, or as a layer over a long tank top or tube dress.

Size: S/M Oversized

Please contact me if you have any questions about a shop item or international shipping costs.

Thanks for looking! <3

name: Baby Doll Dress, Color Block Eco Dress Peacock Blues Pastel Summer Frock
description:
Sweet Funky 3/4 Sleeve Boat Neck Baby Doll Dress--one of a kind.

Sewn from color blocks of sweet vintage floral poly stretch knit, pastel purple, aqua and mint green stretch knit jersey. Bodice of dress is made from a super soft, thin cotton, upcycled boat neck shirt with thin stripes of black and dark aqua color. Exposed hems.


I love the color and print combinations in this one! A sweet, versatile addition to your wardrobe. Super cute alone or worn with leggings or pants. <3

Made using my own pattern. Designed and sewn entirely by me using quality salvaged and thrifted fabrics.

Size: M/L with lots of stretch

Neckline: 32"
Chest: 34+" lots of stretch
Waist and Hips: Free
Length: 29"

Please contact me if you have any questions about a shop item or international shipping costs.

Thanks for looking! <3

name: Blouse Romantic Breezy/ Eco Hipster Crop Shirt
description:
Soft, Super Sheer, Retro Floral Stretch Knit Shirt with Batwing sleeves--one of a kind.

I make these shirts using my own pattern. Designed and sewn entirely by me using quality salvaged and thrifted fabrics. This one is sewn from some lovely, tissue thin, vintage fabric with a blue, red, and brown delicate floral print on a sheer, creamy white background, and is a bit longer in the back.

A sweet, versatile addition to your wardrobe. <3

Size: M/L Oversized

Please contact me if you have any questions about a shop item or international shipping costs.

Thanks for looking! <3
